RemediationStrings.Title: NinjaRMM Agent is not installed.
RemediationStrings.Description: Please install the NinjaRMM agent to ensure your device is compliant. You can find the installer inside the Company Portal App. For help, click the link to submit a ticket to Umbrella.

RemediationStrings.Title: NinjaRMM Agent Service is not running.
RemediationStrings.Description: Please restart your computer to ensure your device is compliant. For help, click the link to submit a ticket to Umbrella.
